title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 14 October 2016 - XWiki
content:

11:08 <vmassol> msmeria: I'm curious  
11:09 <vmassol> why did you enable syntaxes on xwiki.org?  
11:09 <vmassol> :)  
11:09 <vmassol> actually  
11:09 <vmassol> it's the other way around!  
11:12 <msmeria> vmassol: the only thing I did was to go to http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/admin/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=globaladmin&section=Syntaxes  
11:12 <msmeria> I didn't even click Save  
11:12 <msmeria> I just wanted to check something  
11:13 <msmeria> it must be a bug

17:05 <putao> has joined #xwiki  
17:07 <putao> Hi there!  
17:07 <putao> Im trying to install User Directory extension but i cant localize it in the Extension Manager search. Any idea? Im using XWiki 8.3  
17:08 <vmassol> putao: hi  
17:08 <vmassol> you should already have it by default :)  
17:08 <vmassol> see http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/User+Directory+Application  
17:08 <vmassol> BUNDLED WITH  
17:09 <vmassol> the doc is lacking a bit...  
17:09 <vmassol> it's accessible from the drawer menu at the top right  
17:09 <vmassol> 'User Index'  
17:11 <putao> I used the war installation and after install I havent the User Index option. I didnt install the Enterprise Xwiki Flavor. Do I have to select the Flavor option?  
17:12 <vmassol> putao: see this step: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationWAR#HInstalltheXWikiUI  
17:12 <vmassol> so you need to follow the Distribution Wizard  
17:16 <putao> I'll check it  
17:16 <putao> thanks!  
17:17 <vmassol> np  
17:25 <Pbas> Hello, about LDAP authentification. I can use my previous ldap settings in xwiki.cfg in xwiki 8.3 version? (seem more confortable/flexible for me because I use ldapS, I  map group or/and admin group with ldap group)? Anyway IMO it is better to have authentication settings outside database and without needed to install ldap extension.  
17:25 <vmassol> isn't ldap support an extension now?  
17:26 <Pbas> On doc: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LDAP/Authenticator "You can setup the LDAP configuration in the xwiki.cfg file by filling the following properties" with ldap stuff  
17:26 <vmassol> "This extension was bundled by default in XWiki Enterprise till XWiki 8.2.x. It's been moved out and made optional starting with XWiki 8.3M1."  
17:26 <vmassol> (at http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LDAP/Authenticator/ )  
17:27 <Pbas> now I'm on 7.0.1  
17:27 <vmassol> ok  
17:27 <vmassol> ". I can use my previous ldap settings in xwiki.cfg in xwiki 8.3 version?" yes  
17:27 <Pbas> and I was ready for 8.2.1 but I can upgrade on 8.3 directly  
17:27 <vmassol> I don't think it has changed  
17:27 <vmassol> yes better go to 8.3  
17:28 <Pbas> but I saw some ldap issue fixed on 9.x version :/  
17:28 <vmassol> yes progress doesn't stop ;)  
17:28 <Pbas> ha ha  
17:29 <Pbas> Ok then I try to keep my xwiki.cfg ldap setting but I suppose I need install ldap extension at first  
17:30 <vmassol> that said, I haven't followed  
17:31 <vmassol> ok you're talking about http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/LDAP-34  
17:31 <vmassol> it's an improvement not a bug fix  
17:31 <Pbas> Hum http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/LDAP-8 : Add a trusted+LDAP SSO authenticator I need to test  
17:31 <vmassol> you an see roadmap and changelog here: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/LDAP  
17:31 <vmassol> changelog: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/LDAP#selectedTab=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project%3Achangelog-panel  
17:34 <Pbas> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LDAP/  "The authenticator can't find the user on LDAP server in case of trusted authentication" "dd a trusted+LDAP SSO authenticator" "Group constraint is broken" "The authenticator should use bindDN as user DN instead of searching for it" I need to check theses issues  
17:44 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki
